00023 #ifndef H_SPK_REGISTERABLE

00030 // A macro implementing the clone method for Registerable children
00031 // Note that copyChildren and destroyChildren have to be implemented manually if needed
00032 #define SPK_IMPLEMENT_REGISTERABLE(ClassName) \
00033 \
00034 virtual ClassName* clone(bool createBase) const \
00035 { \
00036             ClassName* cloneObject = new ClassName(*this); \
00037             cloneObject->copyChildren(*this,createBase); \
00038             return cloneObject; \
00039 } \
00040 \
00041 public : \
00042 virtual std::string getClassName() const {return #ClassName;}
00043 
00044 
00045 namespace SPK

00048             typedef unsigned long SPK_ID;
00049             
00051             extern SPK_PREFIX const SPK_ID NO_ID;
00052 
00054             extern SPK_PREFIX const std::string NO_NAME;

00086             class SPK_PREFIX Registerable
00087             {
00088             friend class SPKFactory;
00089 
00090             public :
00091 
00093                         // Constructors //
00095 
00097                         Registerable();
00098

00104 
00106                         // Destructor //
00108

00111

00115 
00123                         inline void setShared(bool shared);
00124 
00132                         inline void setDestroyable(bool destroyable);

00189                         inline bool isDestroyable() const;
00190 
00200                         inline const std::string& getName() const;
00201 
00209                         virtual std::string getClassName() const = 0;
00210 
00212                         // Interface //
00214 
00227                         inline virtual Registerable* findByName(const std::string& name);
00228 
00229             protected :
00230 
00241                         void registerChild(Registerable* child,bool registerAll);
00242 
00253                         Registerable* copyChild(Registerable* child,bool createBase);
00254 
00265                         bool destroyChild(Registerable* child,bool keepChildren);
00266 
00275                         inline void incrementChildReference(Registerable* child);
00276 
00285                         inline void decrementChildReference(Registerable* child);
00286 
00303                         static void registerObject(Registerable* obj,bool registerAll = false);
00304 
00306                         // Virtual methods //
00308 
00319                         virtual void registerChildren(bool registerAll){};
00320 
00331                         virtual void copyChildren(const Registerable& object,bool createBase){};
00332 
00342                         virtual void destroyChildren(bool keepChildren){};
00343 
00344             private :
00345 
00346                         SPK_ID ID;
00347                         unsigned int nbReferences;
00348 
00349                         std::string name;
00350 
00351                         bool shared;
00352                         bool destroyable;
00353 
00354                         // Those methods allow specific behavior when registering and unregistering in the SPKFactory
00355                         virtual inline void onRegister() {}             // Called when a registerable is registered in the SPKFactory
00356                         virtual inline void onUnregister() {}           // Called when a registerable is unregistered from the SPKFactory
00357 
00358                         inline void incrementReference();
00359                         inline void decrementReference();
00360 
00361                         // the assignment operator is private
00362                         Registerable& operator=(const Registerable& registerable);
00363 
00365                         // Pure virtual method //
00367 
00376                         virtual Registerable* clone(bool createBase) const = 0;
00377             };

00405             inline bool Registerable::isRegistered() const
00406             {
00407                         return ID != NO_ID;
00408             }
00409 
00410             inline bool Registerable::isShared() const
00411             {
00412                         return shared;

00416             {

00421             {

00425             inline Registerable* Registerable::findByName(const std::string& name)
00426             {
00427                         return getName().compare(name) == 0 ? this : NULL;
00428             }
00429 
00430             inline void Registerable::incrementReference()
00431             {
00432                         if (isRegistered())
00433                                     ++nbReferences;
00434             }
00435 
00436             inline void Registerable::decrementReference()
00437             {
00438                         if ((isRegistered())&&(nbReferences > 0))
00439                                     --nbReferences;
00440             }
00441 
00442             inline void Registerable::incrementChildReference(Registerable* child)
00443             {
00444                         if ((isRegistered())&&(child != NULL))
00445                                     child->incrementReference();
00446             }
00447 
00448             inline void Registerable::decrementChildReference(Registerable* child)
00449             {
00450                         if ((isRegistered())&&(child != NULL))
00451                                     child->decrementReference();
00452             }
00453 }
